modShortDescription: This mod adds the Magbow weapon to the 7 Days to Die. Custom sound and fire animation. Bolt velocity is 40% faster than crossbow. Reflex sight looks great.
modDescription:
This mod adds the Magbow [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/) to the 7 Days to Die. Russiandood didn’t add any complexity to this mod, simply unlocks with Advanced Engineering 5.

## Features

* Holds 10 bolts.
* Custom sound and fire animation.
* Bolt velocity is 40% faster than a crossbow.
* Entity damage is increased by 10.
* Attachments work for the most part, may need additional tweaking. Reflex sight looks great and would recommend it!

Depending on how well this does, Russiandood may add more complexity to the Magbow, but here is what he has so far.

**Disclaimer:** 3D Model is purchased. May not be used without permission.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1rGiwfZObTJ_AxNY1ZU6-7eL18kgMZrAo&export=download)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16018-magbow/).

**Credits:** Russiandood
